text:
I have definitely encountered this issue before with customers using
McAfee/Trellix products. Could be a bad definitions update or the on access
scanner. Start by disabling services systematically to narrow down which one is
causing the issue. There should also be service logs to identify if anything is
being blocked.

metadata.topic: The User Profile Service failed the sign in. User profile cannot be loaded
